fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
R3 is actively contributing to the conversation around Distributed Ledger Technology (or Blockchain Technology).  As the technology is still developing, there are few initiatives, policies, or legislative files on the topic.  However, the ones that we are currently focused on are:  
 
- European Securities and Markets Authority (ESMA): The Distributed Ledger Technology Applied to Securities Markets  
- European Parliament’s Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs: Draft Report on FinTech: the influence of technology on the future of the financial sector”  
 
Moreover, as a consortium, the majority of which is highly regulated financial institutions, that is designing solutions to be used in the financial markets, a large number of regulations are of interest to R3 including MiFID2/MiFIR, EMIR, and Basel III.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: We are currently a member of the International Swaps and Derivatives Association (ISDA) and the Bankers Association for Finance and Trade (BAFT).  We are very active in the Distributed Ledger Technology Space and are actively exploring use cases in a variety of areas.  As such, we are members of two diverse trade associations and intend to continue expanding the associations of which we are members based on areas of focus.
goals__remit:
R3 is an enterprise software firm working with a network of over 200 financial institutions, regulators, trade associations, professional services firms and technology companies to develop on Corda, its blockchain platform designed specifically for businesses. 
 
Operating in eleven countries from all regions of the world, the R3 team is made up of financial industry veterans, technologists, and new tech entrepreneurs, bringing together expertise from electronic financial markets, cryptography and digital currencies.
position: Senior Counsel & Director of Regulatory Affairs
